title: Opening a league game freezes my computer a couple minutes into the game.
body:
I have tried uninstalling, Updating graphic card drives and nothing it working, Its getting to the point i am unable to play at all.. Any suggests would be much appreciated.. Here are my specs- 
Windows 10
MSI
Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-5700HQ CPU @ 2.70GHz
8.00 GB
64 Bit operating system, x64 based processor


halp

replies.body: This game freeze has been happening to a few players after a recent Windows 10 update.  The issue seems to be with the Xbox game bar not playing well with league.  Disable the [Xbox Game Bar ](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) to get this fixed up.  Let me know if you still have any issues afterwards.

Hello, would it be since Windows 10 Anniversary update exactly?
If yes, try this tutorial:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sU6DFUgBE4g
